greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sign of first differences of Recamán's sequence A005132.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: A160357 = chi_A057165 - chi_A057166, where chi_A denotes the characteristic function of (the set of values of) A.
mathematica: f[s_List] := Module[{a = s[[-1]], n = Length[s]}, Append[s, If[a > n && FreeQ[s, a - n], a - n, a + n]]];
Nest[f, {0}, 100] // Differences // Sign (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 19 2020, using _Robert G. Wilson v_'s code for A005132 *)
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Jun 03 2009
ext: a(0)=1 added by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 01 2020
